title: Spinach and ricotta filo pie
ingredients: ['300g fresh spinach', '1 small onion, chopped', '1 knob butter', '350g ricotta cheese', '80g grated Parmesan cheese', '2 eggs', '1 teaspoon ground nutmeg', 'salt and black pepper to taste', '1 packet filo pastry', '70g melted butter', '6 egg yolks']
